history.content: The only grades that count toward declaration are grade in courses taken at Cal.

I'm currently in COE and was looking to double in eecs. I took cs61b this semester, but ended up p/np it. I know the shadow grade can still be used for declaration purposes...but let's say I don't get a good enough grade in 61b to meet the 3.3 declaration requirement. Am I allowed to take the class equivalent at CC over the summer and use that for declaration? Or do all classes used for eecs declaration have to be taken at UC Berkeley?
history.subject: declaring eecs
